wysiwyg_a.p: This function block generates several events which indicate different resource start conditions or when the resource will be stopped.

wysiwyg.p: 'COLD'-Event: Generates one event after a coldstart (power-on boot) of the resource.
'WARM'-Event: Generates one event after a soft-reset (restart) of the resource.
'STOP'-Event: Generates one event before the resource is stopped.
